file(COPY  bug_407_ac.cir bug_407_ac.cir.sh bug_407_dc.cir bug_407_dc.cir.sh bug_407_hb.cir bug_407_hb.cir.sh tags bug_407_hb.cir.tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_407_ac.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_407_dc.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_407_hb.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_407_SON/bug_407_ac.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_407_ac.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_407_ac.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_407_SON/bug_407_ac.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_407_SON/bug_407_ac.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_407_ac.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_407_SON/bug_407_ac.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;bug407")
endif()

endif()
